description:
We invite everyone to enjoy this course, which will help you to create a unique and extraordinary business and stay away from competition seriously. This course was created based an award we obtained in the Peter Drucker Challenge.

We hope you enjoy !!

Many entrepreneurs and business scholars believe that being an entrepreneur is born with or something that only a few highly gifted people can carry it out. We think not, and that anyone on the planet can be an entrepreneur and succeed. No need to be a genius, a business manager or have an MBA to start a business. All you need is decision. In fact, the most famous serial entrepreneurs in the world are totally ordinary people, and believe me ... they are no better than you. Only that they had the decision and conviction to bring an idea to reality, and not give up too soon.

Our goal is to offer general advice so you can create a successful business model from anywhere in the world where you are. The course aims to give you the tools to be able to transform a simple idea into a disruptive innovation.

The course is structured in 4 sections:

The Life of an Entrepreneur: In this section we discuss the meaning of entrepreneurship, the personality it needs an entrepreneur to run a business, how to create a successful business model and strategic innovation process.
The Fertilization of the Idea: In this section we talk about the importance of the creation of the idea, the meaning of the idea and how to use differents tools of innovation to create the best idea possible.
The Gestation of the Idea: In this section we analyze the process of developing the idea chosen in order to achieve a unique business model.
The Birth of the Idea: In this last section we analyze the birth of the idea, the launch of the business model and the importance of testing the model.

The main benefits of this course are:

  • Meaning of entrepreneurship
  • Understand that requires an entrepreneur to be successful
  • Understand what it is an idea and how work it.
  • Clarify ideas
  • Systematically develop an idea
  • Achieve various business models
  • Choosing the best business model
  • Launch and test business model
  • Feedback and changes according to market realities
  • Achieving a unique, different and sustainable business


This course is based on an essay that we sent to international management challenge in which we obtained a place among the best. (Peter Drucker Challenge)

We hope that you create your own Great Business, with a picture and a clearer view of what is build and manage a business.
title: Strategic Innovation For Entrepreneurs
